ygData.subject: RE: Weapons at level 9 and up
ygData.msgSnippet: Hang out just outside Crushbone, they usually will loot Dvinn, run outside and auction it, I have seen them sell for 10 pp.  You might get lucky.  The
ygData.messageBody:
Hang out just outside Crushbone, they usually will loot Dvinn, run outside
and auction it, I have seen them sell for 10 pp. You might get lucky. The
dragoon's dirk is better than almost any combine/well balanced weapon. I
would not waste any money on the store bought variety, Demon claws are nice,
but very expensive, and so is the PGT, if you don't need magical weapons
yet, the Dwarven axe that comes off Lord Darvish is great, there are two
varieties, 1hs, and 2hs, bards can only use the 1h version. The 2h version
sells for some serious plat tho, so it's good to get to sell. The one hand
version does dmg 6, delay 26, so it's delay is almost as good as Dirk, and
it does same damage, so except for the non magical ability it's a really
good weapon. In one hit the Mino axe does more damage, over the length of a
fight, you will do 20PTS+ more damage than the mino because you swung almost
30% faster. It makes a big difference, it also maxes your 1hs skill faster,
between the dirk and axe, I max both my skills within about 20 minutes of
leveling.

Wenaddar


> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Buenavides [SMTP:jbuenavides@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 3:28 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Weapons at level 9 and up
>
> From: John Buenavides <jbuenavides@...>
>
> I have just reached Level 9, and am currently considering going
> beyond the safety of East Commonlands. (Prexus Server)
>
> I am still using my trusty Scimitar, and I have tried a Mino Axe, but
> have found that while the large damage is nice, it is kinda slow.
>
> I have enough money to get a Combine Scimitar, but seeing as it is
> just a magic upgrade (and one speed) to the Scimitar, I have held
> off. I have seen the Swashbuckler with his 200pp+ weapons, and I'm
> trying to decide if it is worth saving money for those Well-Balanced
> weapons or a Demon's Claw / Dragoon's Dirk if I come across them.
>
> How resaleable are the well balanced weapons?
>
> And where should I hang around to hear auctions on Dragoon's Dirk?
> Greater Faydark near Crushbone?
>
> Thanks guys.
>
> ===
